description: Searches for any Q topic that exists in an Amazon QuickSight account.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the topic that you want to find.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: The filters that you want to use to search for the topic. (dict) --- The filter that is used to search for a topic. The operator like equals or like. The name of the topic search filter. The value of the topic search filter.

nested_params.name: Operator
nested_params.description: The operator like equals or like.

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the topic search filter.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value of the topic search filter.

nested_items.name: TopicSummaryList
nested_items.description: A list of topic summaries that is returned by the search topic request.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the topic.

nested_items.name: TopicId
nested_items.description: The ID for the topic. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: UserExperienceVersion
nested_items.description: The user experience version of the topic.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results, or null if there are no more results.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.
